Posts.Content: tjgraham wrote: Hi, everyone.. I'm not sure if this is the appropriate place to post this, but I know that this forum meant a lot to my Mom. For those of you that knew Joy Heady (JoyRebecca), she passed on Monday. My Mom drew strength and courage and solace from all of you and my family would like to thank you all from the bottom of our hearts for that. I'm going to continue living my life the way she did, with courage and strength and faith and love. She'll live on in me, and because of that she'll also live on in my kids, and theirs. I hope that her spirit lives in with all of you as well. Peace and love to you all. TJ Graham  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: JoyRebecca is an angel tjgraham Danie
